table.name: encounters
table.remarks: Contains demographic, comorbidities, admission-discharge, and death related information for each encounter

column.name: patient_deiden_id
column.remarks: Deidentified Patient's Medical Record Number for the Shands UF hospital

column.name: encounter_deiden_id
column.remarks: Deidentified Patient's Encounter Number

column.name: index_encounter_y_n
column.remarks: This variable indicates whether this encounter is a surgical encounter

column.name: hospital
column.remarks: Location of care

column.name: encounter_effective_date
column.remarks: The date that the patient received services offered by the Shands UF hospital.

column.name: admit_datetime
column.remarks: It represents the first time the patient was placed in a room in the hospital.

column.name: admit_source
column.remarks: The source where the patient was admited.

column.name: dischg_datetime
column.remarks: This is only populated for hospital encounters. It represents the date and time the patient was discharged from the hospital. Format is mm/dd/yyyy HH:mm.

column.name: sex
column.remarks: This object represents the current patient sex only. It is not the sex of the patient at any individual encounter.

column.name: race
column.remarks: represents the current patient race only.

column.name: ethnicity
column.remarks: This object represents the current patient ethnicity only.

column.name: language
column.remarks: This object represents the current patient language only.

column.name: city
column.remarks: Patient city at the time of the encounter.

column.name: country
column.remarks: Patient's country.

column.name: zip
column.remarks: Patient's zip code at the time of the encounter.

column.name: state
column.remarks: 2-letter abbreviation of patient's state at the time of the encounter

column.name: county
column.remarks: Returned will be either the Florida county name (for Florida patients) or "z non-FL or unk" (for all other patients).

column.name: marital_status
column.remarks: Possible values are DIVORCED, LIFE PARTNER/SIG OTHER, MARRIED, SEPARATED, SINGLE, OTHER, UNKNOWN, WIDOWED.

column.name: ed_arrival_datetime
column.remarks: The date and time that the patient enters the Emergency Department (prior to OR surgery).

column.name: attending_dr_deiden_id
column.remarks: Attending Physician name.

column.name: referring_dr_deiden_id
column.remarks: Referring Doctor for the encounter.

column.name: isdead_y_n
column.remarks: Output is a 'Y' or 'N'. This datum indicates whether or not Shands has been notified that the patient is dead.

column.name: encounter_type
column.remarks: This object is the type of the encounter (e.g., HOSPITAL ENCOUNTER, OFFICE VISIT, SURGERY, ANESTHESIA EVENT).

column.name: appointment_status
column.remarks: Status of the appointment. Values include: Arrived, Canceled, No Show, Left without seen, Scheduled.

column.name: patient_type
column.remarks: The most recent patient type for the encounter.

column.name: hosp_svc_dept
column.remarks: Description of the College of Medicine Department (Medicine, Surgery, Peds, etc.) that is associated with the hospital service of the last attending doctor of record.

column.name: hosp_svc_desc
column.remarks: Description of Hospital Service or Medical Service that is associated with the last attending doctor of record.

column.name: location_of_svc
column.remarks: The clinic or hospital department visited by the patient. For inpatients, this represents the final department that the patient was in.

column.name: external_name
column.remarks: External name of the final department that the patient was in

column.name: birth_date
column.remarks: Patient's birth date. Format is mm/dd/yyyy.

column.name: payer
column.remarks: The payer associated with the primary insurance.

column.name: icd9_admit_diagnosis
column.remarks: This is the condition with which a patient first presents.

column.name: icd9_admit_diagnosis_desc
column.remarks: Text description of the Admit Diagnosis code.

column.name: icd9_admit_diagnosis_group
column.remarks: This is the category that the Admit Diagnosis is in

column.name: icd10_admit_diagnosis
column.remarks: This is the condition with which a patient first presents.

column.name: icd10_admit_diagnosis_desc
column.remarks: Text description of the Admit Diagnosis code.

column.name: icd10_admit_diagnosis_group
column.remarks: This is the category that the Admit Diagnosis is in

column.name: admit_priority
column.remarks: Admit Priority (e.g., EMERGENT, NEWBORN, ELECTIVE, etc.)

column.name: seen_in_ed_y_n
column.remarks: This objects outputs a 'Y' or an 'N' depending on whether a patient had an encounter in the ED.

column.name: seen_in_or_y_n
column.remarks: The indicator will show a 'Y' for those patients who had an OR procedure during their hospital stay (encounter).

column.name: dischg_disposition
column.remarks: Discharge Disposition Description: TO HOME, TO REHAB, LWBS, etc.

column.name: dischg_svc_dept_ip_obs
column.remarks: Department of the service of the attending physician at time of discharge (Medicine, Pediatrics, etc.). (IP/OBS only.)

column.name: dischg_svc_desc_ip_obs
column.remarks: Description of Discharge Hospital Service or Medical Service.

column.name: death_indicator
column.remarks: This will be marked 'Y' if the Discharge Disposition of a particular encounter indicates Expired or Organ Procurement.

column.name: ssdi_death_indicator
column.remarks: This is based on information from the Social Security Death Index (SSDI).

column.name: death_date
column.remarks: Date of the patient's death.

column.name: aids
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: cancer
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: cerebrovascular_disease
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: chf
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: copd
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: dementia
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: diabetes_w_o_complications
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: diabetes_w_complications
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: m_i
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: metastatic_carcinoma
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: mild_liver_disease
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: moderate_severe_liver_disease
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: paraplegia_hemiplegia
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: peptic_ulcer_disease
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: peripheral_vascular_disease
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: renal_disease
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: rheumatologic_disease
column.remarks: This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: aids_poa
column.remarks: POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: cancer_poa
column.remarks: POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: cerebrovascular_poa
column.remarks: POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: chf_poa
column.remarks: Congestive heart failure. POA = Present on Admission. This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: copd_poa
column.remarks: Chronic obstuctive pulmonary disease. POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: dementia_poa
column.remarks: POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: diabetes_w_o_complications_poa
column.remarks: POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: diabetes_w_complications_poa
column.remarks: POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: m_i_poa
column.remarks: Myocardial infarction. POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: metastatic_carcinoma_poa
column.remarks: POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: mild_liver_disease_poa
column.remarks: POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: moderate_severe_liver_disease_poa
column.remarks: POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: paraplegia_hemiplegia_poa
column.remarks: POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: peptic_ulcer_disease_poa
column.remarks: POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: peripheral_vascular_disease_poa
column.remarks: POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: renal_disease_poa
column.remarks: POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: rheumatologic_poa
column.remarks: POA = Present on Admission.This will be a 1 if present or a 0 if not present.

column.name: charlson_comorbidity_total_score
column.remarks: This score is computed based on 12 weighted comorbidities per the methodology defined by Quan, H., et. al. in a 2011 article.

column.name: height_cm
column.remarks: Patient's height in centimeters (cm) at the time of the encounter.

column.name: weight_kgs
column.remarks: Patient's weight in kilograms (kg) at the time of the encounter.

column.name: ssdi_death_date
column.remarks: Patient's death date, based on the information from the Social Security Death Index (SSDI).

column.name: smoking_status
column.remarks: Patient's smoking status.

column.name: ip_obs_admit_datetime
column.remarks: The date and time that the inpatient was admitted to the Shands UF hospital.

column.name: ip_obs_dischg_datetime
column.remarks: The date and time that the inpatient was discharged from the Shands UF hospital.

column.name: admit_datetime_from_billing
column.remarks: The admited date and time from billing.

column.name: dischg_datetime_from_billing
column.remarks: The discharged date and time from billing.

column.name: ed_dischg_datetime
column.remarks: The date and time that the patient was discharged from the ED (Emergency Department).

table.name: glasgow
table.remarks: Contains Glasgow coma score including its components: eye, verbal, motor and sum

column.name: patient_deiden_id
column.remarks: Deidentified Patient's Medical Record Number for the Shands UF hospital.

column.name: encounter_deiden_id
column.remarks: Deidentified Patient's Encounter Number.

column.name: anes_enc_y_n
column.remarks: Indicator if flowsheet data tied to anesthesia encounter

column.name: glasgow_coma_datetime
column.remarks: Indicator if data occurred between anesthesia start/stop times

column.name: organ_procurement_notified_y_n
column.remarks: The date and time when the level of consciousness was evaluated

column.name: glasgow_coma_adult_eye_opening
column.remarks: Lifequest notified of GCS of score equal 5 or less than 5

column.name: glasgow_coma_adult_verbal_response
column.remarks: Score of eye opening response for adult patient, rated on a scale of 1 to 4

column.name: glasgow_coma_adult_motor_response
column.remarks: Score of verbal response for adult patient, rated on a scale of 1 to 5.

column.name: glasgow_coma_adult_score
column.remarks: Score of motor response for adult patient, rated on a scale of 1 to 6.

column.name: MEAS_VALUE
column.remarks: MAC component value

column.name: encounter_deiden_id
column.remarks: Deidentified Encounter # (CSN): Patient Encounter Number

column.name: anes_enc_y_n
column.remarks: Indicator of Anesthesia Encounter

column.name: mews_datetime
column.remarks: Modified Early Warning ScoreS Recorded DateTime

table.name: mobility
table.remarks: Contains the mobility situation of patients

column.name: patient_deiden_id
column.remarks: Deidentified Patient's Medical Record Number for the Shands UF hospital.

column.name: encounter_deiden_id
column.remarks: Deidentified Patient's Encounter Number.

column.name: recorded_time
column.remarks: The date and time when the patient's mobility was evaluated

column.name: activity
column.remarks: Patient's activity, such as In bed, Stood at bedside, Dangled, Ambulated in room, etc.

column.name: level_of_assistance
column.remarks: Level of assistance provided to reposition

column.name: positioning_frequency
column.remarks: The frequency of reposition

column.name: pressure_relief
column.remarks: Patient's body parts that needed to relieve pressure

column.name: contributing_factors
column.remarks: Factors that contributed to patient's mobility

column.name: head_of_bed_elevated
column.remarks: Patient's positioning during head of bed elevation

column.name: repositioned
column.remarks: The reposition methods that the patient used

column.name: anti_embolism_devices
column.remarks: Off if patient turned off the anti-embolism device

column.name: anti_embolism_intervention
column.remarks: Anti-embolism intervention method the the patient used

column.name: pressure_relief_type
column.remarks: Movement types that the patient used to relief presure

column.name: pressure_relief_assistance
column.remarks: Equipments or assistances that the patient used to relief pressure

column.name: assistive_device
column.remarks: The device that the patient used to assist his/her movements

column.name: range_of_motion
column.remarks: Status of whether the patient was able to move his/her joints.

column.name: heels_feet
column.remarks: Status of the patient's heels and feet

column.name: cpm
column.remarks: Status of whether a CPM (Continuous Passive Motion) machine was used.

column.name: transport_method
column.remarks: The method used to transport the patient. Values include Impaired Mobility, Risk of Dislodging LDAs, etc.

column.name: ambulation_response
column.remarks: Patient's response for ambulation

column.name: transport_with
column.remarks: The equipment used to transport the patient

column.name: distance_ambulated_ft
column.remarks: Ambulation distance in ft

column.name: pt_refused_anti_embolism_intervention
column.remarks: Yes if patient refused to use anti-embolism intervention

table.name: or_case_schedule
table.remarks: Contains surgery related data including operating room, time, procedure code, and doctor for each surgery

column.name: patient_deiden_id
column.remarks: Deidentified Patient's Medical Record Number for the Shands UF hospital.

column.name: encounter_deiden_id
column.remarks: Deidentified Patient's Encounter Number.

column.name: case_status
column.remarks: Status for cases that were scheduled.

column.name: case_class
column.remarks: The native (user selected) value from EPIC system. Refer to the

column.name: sched_location
column.remarks: Scheduled location of surgery

column.name: sched_north_south
column.remarks: Scheduled location of surgery. Groups the ORs into North, South and Other.

column.name: sched_site
column.remarks: Scheduled site of surgery: NORA (North Tower), SORA (South Tower), CSC (Children's Surgical Center), and FSC (Florida Surgical Center), MORA (Shands AGH)

column.name: sched_site_description
column.remarks: Scheduled site of surgery with more breakdown for North and South Tower ORs. (e.g. - 'GNV CATH LAB','GNV GI SUITE')

column.name: sched_service
column.remarks: The surgical service of the scheduled case. These mimic ADT services except that Anesthesia and Pain Management are combined.

column.name: sched_room
column.remarks: The room where the case was scheduled. (This may not be the room where the case actually occurred.)

column.name: sched_room_type
column.remarks: Categorizes scheduled rooms into functional areas such as: CATH LAB, L&D, Main OR - North Tower, Main OR - South Tower, GI SUITE, GI SEC

column.name: sched_trauma_room_y_n
column.remarks: Indicator of dedicated south tower trauma room

column.name: sched_surg_service
column.remarks: In OpTime, this is the primary surgeon on panel 1. In ORMIS, the main surgeon was the surgeon who scheduled the case.

column.name: sched_patient_class_code
column.remarks: Outputs IP, ED, POA or OP. Observation patients and CM Pending patients (among other types) are classified as OP.

column.name: sched_anesthesia_type
column.remarks: The type of anesthesia scheduled for the case.

column.name: sched_post_op_location
column.remarks: The scheduled destination following surgery.

column.name: sched_case_date
column.remarks: The date surgery is scheduled to be performed.

column.name: sched_start_datetime
column.remarks: The date and time surgery is scheduled to be performed.

column.name: sched_start_time_char
column.remarks: The time that the surgery is scheduled to be performed in 24 hour format. Ex: 1300

column.name: sched_stop_time_char
column.remarks: The time that the surgery is scheduled to finish in 24 hour format. Ex: 1300

column.remarks: Type of room surgery performed in. (e.g. - Radiology, L&D, GI Suite, CATH LAB, Main OR - North Tower, Main OR - South Tower, Main OR - CSC, Main OR - FSC)
